law.catch_line: Board constitutes body corporate -- Name -- Officers -- Meetings -- Quorum.
law.text: Each board shall be a body corporate under the name and style of ".... Public Library District Board of Trustees." The members shall, as soon as possible after their appointment, organize by electing a president, a secretary, a treasurer, and other officers as deemed necessary, each to serve for a term of two (2) years and until a successor is elected and qualified. The board shall meet on a regularly scheduled basis once each month. A majority of the board shall constitute a quorum.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 7. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 6, effective June 16, 1960.
